question: Which of these committees reviewed the financial position of all RRBs in 2010 and recommended for recapitalization?
explanation: The Government had formed a committee in September 2009 under Dr. K. C. Chakrabarty to study the current level of Capital-to-Risk-Weighted Assets Ratio (CRAR) of RRBs. The Committee submitted its Report in 2010. The Committee was also tasked to suggest the required capital structure for RRBs given their business level, so that their CRAR is sustainable and provides for future growth and compliance with regulatory requirements.
